name: lungmask
description: Apply lung segmentation mask to a CT image using deep learning. Takes an image file (NIfTI, DICOM, or other SimpleITK-supported formats) as input and returns a binary lung mask.

parameters.name: model
parameters.description: Lungmask model to use (optional, default: 'R231'). Options: 'R231', 'LTRCLobes', 'R231CovidWeb'

parameters.name: force_cpu
parameters.description: Force CPU usage even if GPU is available (optional, default: false)
